title: Bug 6304 cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully sync a .java file and another resource, without any errors or issues.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
